2. The Conjuring (2013) - This movie is based on a real-life case investigated by paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren. It's known for its suspenseful atmosphere and terrifying jump scares.

4. IT (2017) - A modern adaptation of the beloved Stephen King novel about a group of kids who band together to defeat an ancient, shape-shifting evil entity terrorizing their small town.
5. The Exorcist (1973) - Another classic horror film that still holds up today, this movie tells the story of a young girl possessed by a demon and the two priests who attempt to exorcise it.
6. A Quiet Place (2018) - In a post-apocalyptic world invaded by creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing, a family must navigate their daily lives in silence to avoid being hunted down.
7. Get Out (2017) - This horror film tackles social and political commentary while telling the story of a young African American man who visits his white girlfriend's family estate for the first time.
8. The Babadook (2014) - After the death of her husband, Amelia struggles to raise her troubled son Samuel. When a pop-up book titled Mr. Babadook mysteriously appears in their home, their lives take a dark and terrifying turn.
